entry.title: In My Eternal Winter, You Lit the Way to Summer
entry.summary:
Author: Gbeeyeebe

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,371Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 3

Summary: Clark doesn‚Äôt catch whatever Bruce Wayne says next because his heartbeat wasn‚Äôt just familiar, he *knew* this heartbeat.He double checks it‚Äôs coming from the right person, because he hopes he‚Äôs wrong, knows he isn't, and there‚Äôs no actual way to prove it because it‚Äôs just his memory but- he knows he‚Äôs right. That heartbeat, he‚Äôd recognize it anywhere, he could never forget it. Having it so close to him, under his ear under the stars. The vivid memory of sweet summer kisses in sticky clothes, bright fresh air lapping at them like waves as they ran, days of studying that left them smelling like books and coffee.Bruce Wayne was his first love.-It took Bruce three months to figure out Superman was Clark Kent. It took him a bit longer to accept that Superman was his high school sweetheart.-Or: the one where Bruce knows Clark Kent is Superman, and Superman doesn't know who Batman is, but he knows Bruce Wayne had a secret identity, and overall Bruce is not having a good time, while Clark is trying to figure out his mixed feelings for his past love or his current crush. (Spoilers: they're also the same person. Clark will also not be having a good time)

entry.title: The Dark Knight Before Christmas - A Superbat Year One AU
entry.summary:
Author: EllEmmeCe

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,915Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Gotham is having a very strange Christmas. Bruce Wayne‚Äôs latest vigilante experiment, a horned shadowy figure the press has named ‚ÄúKrampus,‚Äù was supposed to terrify criminals. Instead, it has gone viral as Gotham‚Äôs new holiday mascot. Clark Kent, investigative reporter and part-time baker, is on the case. He is following Krampus‚Äôs trail of cookie crumbs (literally) while secretly moonlighting as ‚ÄúSuper Santa‚Äù to fix Gotham‚Äôs holiday chaos. Between gingerbread turtle clues, a viral photo of Krampus tangled in Christmas lights, and Alfred‚Äôs endless commentary, Bruce is one bad cape snag away from losing his mind. Meanwhile, Clark is just trying to figure out if Gotham‚Äôs scariest new legend is a monster, a myth, or a very grumpy man who needs a hug. It is a holiday season full of crime, cookies, and questionable branding decisions.

entry.title: Your Love Is So (Hurt) Heartful
entry.summary:
Author: Ocyus_Stuff

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,677Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 1,408

Summary: Your father‚Äôs child body should not have been covered in bruises and broken bones.His youngest brother brought little Bruce‚Äôs hand up, resting his forehead against the back of B‚Äôs hands. ‚ÄúYou were supposed to be safe‚Äù, he growled into Bruce‚Äôs hand. He emphasised the word safe, spat the word out with so much offense that as if with enough strength, Damian could will his wish into existence and rewrite this cruel moment of Bruce‚Äôs past and morph it into something kinder, something more befitting for a man who will spend the rest of his adulthood covered in the same kind of bruises and walk the earth with bones broken ten, twenty times over from protecting a city that bites the hands that try to hold it with even the slightest hint of kindness and later, from protecting the whole world with the strength of his heart and the wit of his mind as his greatest weapon.‚ÄúYou were supposed to be l‚Äî" Damian‚Äôs breath hitched, and it was a terrible sound.Loved. Dick finished in his heart. You were supposed to be loved.

entry.title: the first taste of forever
entry.summary:
Author: nepobebe

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,942Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27

Summary: Bruce's thighs clamp down as Clark squeezes him, the fabric of their clothes shifting together as he doesn't let Clark move away for a single moment. Lifting Bruce by his hips, Clark pushes forward again as if he's fucking him. "Good puppy," Bruce groans, voice light and airy. They both freeze, almost immediately. The word seems to echo in the sudden silence, but Clark's mind is entirely blank. "I‚Äîapologize," Bruce says, breathless. "I lost myself for a moment." "Puppy?" Clark asks, light-headed. Heat has rushed through him, up and down, and he would have lost his footing if not for how Bruce has gathered himself in Clark's arms just to feel him as they dry humped. His mind keeps replaying it, over and over until the heat nearly burns. Puppy. He liked it. He liked it a lot. --- Or, Bruce Wayne is fifty-six compared to Clark's twenty years. It's an accident they met tonight. They fall into bed together, anyway, virgin!Clark all too happy to be lost under Bruce's spell. Especially if that means Bruce will train him to be his perfect little pet.

entry.summary:
Author: battinscnz

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,039Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 30

Summary: When winter settles over Gotham in snowfall and silence, Bruce Wayne has no time to enjoy either. Another brutal article hits the tabloids, one after another - sharp, merciless, and written by the one man he cannot stand: Clark Kent of the Daily Planet. Clark has made a career out of dismantling Gotham‚Äôs beloved billionaire, and Bruce is tired of being reduced to headlines he never asked for. When circumstances back both men into a corner, a deal is struck: a temporary arrangement, a carefully staged romance, just long enough to calm the tabloids and get Clark the professional access he needs. They don‚Äôt like each other. They don‚Äôt trust each other. And sharing a public image - let alone a penthouse - was never part of the plan. But winter has a way of softening edges. Holiday events require hand-holding, whispered conversations, and appearances that feel far too real.And somewhere between the frostbitten tension and the late-night honesty, hatred begins to crack - revealing something warmer beneath the ice.
